title: Heimerdinger bug
body: Was playing Heimerdinger, got ganked by warwick, as he was running I noticed that the turret shots followed him when he was out of range, he was taking damage and I killed him when he was on top lane as a Heimerdinger turret shot followed and continued to shoot, even after he died, I fixed it by making a new turret but has anyone else experienced this

replies.body: I have experienced this before, but as far as I know it was just a graphical/animation bug. The turret was shooting across the whole lane from spawn to the enemy, but the shots did no damage, and granted no assist when they died. The turret was also inactive (I wasn't in range for it to be shooting).

Ive seen this bug, but its just a graphical bug. The tower keeps attacking the person even if they run to the otherside of the map until that tower is replaced,  destroyed, you move too far away from it  and it becomes deactivated or it targets something else.  

It probably occur's 1 in every 1000 turrents that are placed.

The person being hit by the  tower doesnt take any damage from it, once they have left the "tower range".

If the person died when he was out of the tower range, it was probably a damge over time effect that killed him or a minion....etc

The bullets already in flight should follow the target after they leave its range, but it should stop shooting more bullets, also they do last for a few seconds after you die before turning off.

or am i misunderstanding the situation?
